Pure Flix Digital is a subsidiary of Pure Flix Entertainment, LLC, the worldwide leader in faith-based entertainment and a Christian movie studio based in Scottsdale, Ariz. that produces, distributes and acquires Christ based movies. Our vision is to positively influence the global culture for Christ through media. Whether it’s on your television, laptop, phone, or tablet, Pure Flix Digital is your trusted destination for the highest quality family-friendly, wholesome entertainment that’s now available anytime, anywhere from www.pureflix.com.

Helping Start-Ups, Re-Starts, and Innovators embrace the Internet of Things, Digital Media & Consumer Electronics with strategies and action plans that deliver valued results via consulting, speaking, & hands-on implementations.
Senior Vice President Strategic Ventures & Partnerships
Responsible for Technicolor’s strategic new business incubator nurturing and mentoring innovative, new teams and ideas toward successful business launches.
Chief Operating Officer for MediaNavi MGO

COO responsible for Technicolor’s MediaNavi MGO technology and business unit focusing on integrated digital content delivery and device management. Greg’s team is focused on the convergence of content, cloud-based applications, and a variety of applications on devices for use at home and on-the-go.

About Digeo:Delivering a competitive advantage with Emmy® Award-winning Moxi™ Media Center software and services, and the most powerful digital entertainment experience for cable subscribers, Digeo, Inc. enables cable providers to become the focal point of the whole-home digital entertainment space. Leading edge software technologies, custom silicon innovation, and full OCAP support allow Digeo to continuously provide lucrative, cost-effective and content-rich media solutions to cable customers nationwide.Moxi Media Center products empower subscribers with the full range of digital entertainment capabilities including: digital video recording (DVR); high-definition (HD) programming; digital media management of photography and music with Moxi Photos and Moxi Jukebox; content sharing with the PC; live, interactive news feeds with Moxi Ticker; Moxi Games; as well as integrated telephony and multi-room capabilities.

Indhu Durai
Product Management at Aareegol (PMP, Agile Certified Product Manager, ITIL foundation certified)
June 12, 2017, Greg was a client of Indhu’s

At a Toastmaster's meeting, a brief conversation with Indhu about the challenges of gathering large sets of data, sorting and analyzing, and then implementing a dashboard for at-a-glance management, led to a working effort between Indhu's firm and PureFlix.com. What followed was a thorough though quick analysis by Indhu and her team as to how best to wrangle our multiple data sources to support the desired output. As a next step, Indhu prepped wireframes for a proposed approach used to confirm the direction of next steps. Throughout this Discovery Phase effort, Indhu exhibited not only a solid understanding of data-gathering and analysis but also strong project management skills to keep things moving in sync with our time schedules.

summary: A proven team leader and serial intrapreneur with 30 years of experience in the technology and consumer electronics fields with an emphasis on the convergence of cable, satellite, and Internet video and services with new hardware products and business models.  Skilled at bridging the gaps between technology and market needs while building multi-cultural teams and business strategies that deliver results.An inventor of record on 22 issued USA technology patents, co-author of two books, and a licensed, private airplane pilot.Specialties: Consumer Electronics, CE, Cable, Satellite, Internet, Streaming Video, Product Marketing, Business Development, Sales, Strategy Development and Strategic Planning, New Business Development, HDTV, Product Line Strategy, Worldwide Sales
name: Greg Gudorf
title: CEO at Pure Flix Digital
